News

Seccubus 2.0.alpha5 released

23 November 2011

It’s has been quite for a while, but today we are releasing Seccubus 2.0.alpha5. This release marks the true start of the GUI rewrite using the JavascriptMVC framework (see: http://javascriptmvc.com/) so a lot of the changes in this release are not immediately visible to everyone. If you want to peek at the new GUI in progress, you can see it by appending ‘/seccubus/seccubus.html’ to your regular Seccubus url.

Seccubus-2.0.alpha4 – Yes, we can haz NMAP

13 September 2011

Long overdue, and mainly because Zate Berg would have otherwise used another tool we now have support for NMAP in Seccubus v2.0

Seccubus-2.0.alpha3 RPMs uploaded

28 August 2011

I just uploaded the RPM and source RPM to our SourceForge release system .

Seccubus-2.0.alpha3 released

15 August 2011

For those of you that were wondering, we’re not dead yet…

Seccubus 2.0.alpha2 RPMs posted to sourceforge

02 May 2011

I just uploaded the Seccubus-2.0alpha2 RPMs to Source Forge.

Seccubus 2.0.alpha2 released

28 April 2011

I just released the tarballs of Seccubus 2.0.alpha2 the RPM’s will follow shortly. You can download it from the download area.

Scan set up documentation

22 April 2011

The biggest feedback I got so far on Seccubus v2 is that that a much needed piece of documentation on how to set up scans was missing.
